Title: Haaland fires Norway closer to World Cup return in easy win over Israel
Summary: Erling Haaland scored a hat-trick to pass 50 international goals in record time . Norway cruised to a 5-0 thrashing of Israel on Saturday, edging closer to qualifying for a first World Cup since 1998 .

Title: UK former singer Ian Watkins dies after prison attack
Summary: Ian Watkins, 48, was serving a 29-year-long jail sentence after being jailed over child sexual abuse . Watkins was a singer in the band Lostprophets before being jailed for 29 years . He died after being attacked in prison on Saturday .

Title: Trump issues order to pay military as shutdown drags on
Summary: President Donald Trump issues order to pay military as shutdown drags on . Many civil servants work without salary in the government shutdown . Trump said he ordered Pentagon chief Pete Hegseth “to use his authority to use the money to pay the military next week .

Title: Bauchi governor reacts to rumoured defection from PDP
Summary: Gov. Bala Mohammed of Bauchi State says he is not defecting from the party . Mohammed is Chairman of the Publicity and Communications Sub-Committee for the forthcoming PDP convention .

Title: Police arrest 37 in Edo for alleged sexual, domestic abuse
Summary: Police arrest 37 suspects for allegedly being involved in sexual and domestic abuse in Edo . Mr Monday Agbonika disclosed this in Benin on Saturday .

Title: Alledged forgery: Fresh questions trail Minister Nnaji’s resignation
Summary: The resignation of Uche Geoffrey Nnaji, Minister of Innovation, Science and Technology, has reopened long-standing concerns about Nigeria’s vetting process for public officials .

Title: Before Ladoja, Emir Sanusi also got the Phantom from same source
Summary: Oba Rashidi Adewolu Ladoja, the new Olubadan of Ibadanland, got a new Rolls-Royce Phantom . Emir Sanusi also got the Phantom from same source .

Title: Jonathan as Tinubu’s toughest challenger, by Dele Sobowale
Summary: Former President Jonathan is the toughest opponent President Tinubu can face in 2027 . The other leading contenders have serious problems deciding who will be presidential or presidential .

Title: Bandits ‘take over’ Yoruba-speaking LGAs in Kogi
Summary: Kogi West Senatorial District, the Yoruba-speaking area of Kogi state, is currently under siege . The area covers seven Local Government Areas (LGAs) Residents of the area, which covers seven LGAs, are said to be at risk .

Title: Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, October 12, 2025
Summary: Traders told market trackers that demand for dollars in the cash market remains firm, keeping parallel quotes elevated . Naira exchange rate today, October 12, 2025 .
